name: Bitsy Dialog Hacks Example
description:
Bitsy has a number of inherent functions and a few hacks that add tremendous flexibility and power to its dialog system. I wanted to showcase these capabilities (and a few others) so more people could be aware of them.

I also pieced together a mod for Bitsy that has these dialog hacks as native parts of the Bitsy Game Maker (such that they can be implemented and previewed in the editor). 

This mod also features a 'timer' system that can be used to call the dialog function/hacks based on time. Fun for creating little 'animated cutscenes.'

That mod can be found here. (download editor.zip, unpack, run index.html in Firefox)

This example game can also be downloaded from the above link.

Do feel free to let me know if you run into any issues using it. Thanks very much <3
